content.question:
​

The x axis ranges from 0 to 12 in increments of 1. 

The y axis ranges from 0 to 7 in increments of 1. 

There are tick marks for every tenth, but the tick marks get closer and closer together moving from each whole number to the next. 

A line is shown passing through the labeled points (0 comma 3) and (10 comma 6).

​The graph shows a semi-log plot of an exponential function of the form <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals a times b to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>·</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and two labeled points. The <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis has a standard scale, and the <math alttext="y"><semantics><mi>y</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis has a logarithmic base <math alttext="10"><semantics><mn>10</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> scale. What are the values of <math alttext="a"><semantics><mi>a</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="b"><semantics><mi>b</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="a equals 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="b equals 3 over 10"><semantics><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="a equals 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="b equals 10 to the power of open parentheses 3 divided by 10 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>/</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="a equals 10 cubed"><semantics><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="b equals 3 over 10"><semantics><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​​<math alttext="a equals 10 cubed"><semantics><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="b equals 10 to the power of open parentheses 3 divided by 10 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>/</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​​​<math alttext="a equals 10 cubed"><semantics><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="b equals 10 to the power of open parentheses 3 divided by 10 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>/</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
